resources.string:
1- You have to take clear photos 

2- You have to determine the accurate location 

3- You have not to take photo for small garbage 

4- You have not to take any person photos 

5- For citizen "Your request should be accepted before receiving points" 

6- The picture sizes should be maximum 126KB

This Application is considered a revolution in changing the life of the environment and the entire human being and helping the community greatly in the cleanliness of the environment and enjoying a clean, safer and healthier life among people.
